name: Kickin’ Jalapeño Burger Seasoning
summary: Bring some zing to your burgers with our Kickin' Jalapeño Burger Seasoning, made with select spices and real jalapeño peppers. We made this versatile seasoning to bring spicy umami flavor (with a hint of lime) to anything and everything that we could throw on the BBQ. It's a spicy blend but you can add as much or as little heat as you want to cater to your tastes. Simply combine with your burger meat (or sprinkle on vegetables that have been lightly oiled) for an impressive, healthy alternative to takeout burgers.
